20 May 2016

FILMR

Code on Github

Filmr aims to disrupt Hollywood by enabling creatives to interact direct with an audience. Users can upload screenplays by genre while adding reviews and upvotes.

The current iteration of the app includes a Devise authentication and Facebook Oauth Login. Create a new script, save by genre, and make comments on any script.
